document_data.mainbody:
Captain Herabs leather armor was a unique enchanted light armor worn by Captain Herab who sailed the Sea of Swords in the late 14 century DR.
This lest of leather armor was masterfully crafted and reinforced with lightweight metal plates and ensorcelled to provide extra defense without a loss of flexibility.
The armor possessed a +3 enchantment.
Captain Herab wore this set of magic armor during her tenure working for the Black Network in the , transporting smuggled weapons and supplies of an orcish army that menaced the city of Daggerford. She was adorned in the armor when faced with the Hero of Daggerford and his allies in the pirate hideout of the Crabs Claw Coast. With her life likely being forfeit, the fate of Captain Herabs leather armor was unknown after that point.
